metadata.title: CVE-2022-39327 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Azure CLI is the command-line interface for Microsoft Azure. In versionsprevious to 2.40.0, Azure CLI contains a vulnerability for potential codeinjection. Critical scenarios are where a hosting machine runs an Azure CLIcommand where parameter values have been provided by an external source.The vulnerability is only applicable when the Azure CLI command is run on aWindows machine and with any version of PowerShell and when the parametervalue contains the `&` or `|` symbols. If any of these prerequisites arenot met, this vulnerability is not applicable. Users should upgrade toversion 2.40.0 or greater to receive a a mitigation for the vulnerability.

criterions.comment: azure-cli package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
